title: "Drones used in law enforcement raise privacy concerns"
excerpt: "As surveillance technology expands across Michigan, law enforcement agencies want to expand their strategies with it, finding new ways to conduct remote, efficient policing with drones. The State Police was the first department in the nation to use drones for policing in 2015."
